CustomField.description: The Approval Status of the Expense
CustomField.formula:
If( tc9_et__Approval_Flag__c, (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_et__t2pJ_Images/t2pJ_Images/WordApproved.png","Approved",20,88)), If( tc9_et__Rejection_Flag__c , (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_et__t2pJ_Images/t2pJ_Images/WordRejected.png","Rejected",20,88)),
If( tc9_et__Submitted_Flag__c, (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_et__t2pJ_Images/t2pJ_Images/WordSubmitted.png","Submitted",20,88)),
(IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_et__t2pJ_Images/t2pJ_Images/WordNew.png","New",20,88)) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Approval Status of the Expense
CustomField.label: Approval Status
